sections.title: Verse 1
content: Hail, holy Queen, mother of mercy,
Our life, our sweetness, and our hope!

sections.title: Verse 2
content: To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve;
To thee do we send up our sighs, mourning and weeping in this valley of tears.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Thine eyes of mercy toward us;
